I made a new portfolio site to show some of my photography, coding and design work. Stay tuned for more content!

### Mobile and Desktop Accessibility üì±üíª 

<details><summary></summary>

<br/>

The site was made for both desktop and mobile. On desktop the keyboard buttons can be used to navigate the site. On mobile the carousels can be swiped.

[Desktop experience](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/98150294/529599251-ab882cd4-b776-42f3-a216-713162b9e9ce.mov?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..ncbvlNVpkREcVxtwHK4k34wm__-meSR2l-wlg1CT0yU)
